name: Jailbreak (itch) (Igor's Games)
description:
A short puzzle game about escaping the security sandbox.

Use WASD or arrow keys to move, R to restart from checkpoint, and X to select in the menu and skip texts. 

Made with PuzzleScript, source here: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=be61c81b1bbf33bffcfe73e97a1c1459
